user_request: View the shopping cart on amazon. Search for razer nari on amazon, select the first entry, and add it to the cart.
screen_desc: The screenshot shows an online shopping page for a black gaming headset with THX Spatial Audio, an auto-adjust headband, and a flip microphone. The product is currently on a 50% discount, priced at $49.99 instead of $99.99. Shipping to the Netherlands costs $15.17, with an estimated delivery between December 15-30. The item usually ships within 1 to 2 months. There is a prominent yellow "Add to Cart" button at the bottom for purchasing.

click on the search suggestion for amazon.com located at the upper left.
